lead_paragraph: The White House is nominating Gen. Lori Robinson to lead all military forces in North America, under the United States Northern Command.

headline.print_headline: In First, Woman Picked for a Top Military Post
headline.main: First Woman Nominated to Lead U.S. Combatant Command

snippet: The White House is nominating Gen. Lori Robinson to lead all military forces in North America, under the United States Northern Command.
abstract: Defense Secretary Ashton B Carter says White House will nominate Air Force Gen Lori J Robinson to lead United States Northern Command; if confirmed, Robinson would be first woman to head one of United States' combatant commands.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
